assessments.status_rationale: News indicates the shutdown continues and legal actions are ongoing, but there is no report that Congress has passed or the President has signed a continuing resolution yet.
The ISM Services PMI for October has not been released; no coverage of a print window in today’s news.
October nonfarm payrolls are due later; nothing in the news provides the official BLS figure.
September core PCE data have not been published yet; no BEA release cited in the news items.
Eurostat’s October flash core HICP is not reported in the provided news; outcome remains unknown.
The Caixin Manufacturing PMI for October has not been covered; no print range can be confirmed.
No reporting on DXY closes near 104.50; the window runs through November 30.
No evidence of a BIS Federal Register action pausing or extending China-related export controls in the news.
There is no Qualcomm press release or SEC filing noted announcing a hyperscaler partnership for AI200/AI250.
No weekly claims figure ≥245,000 is cited; the time window remains open.
Meta’s Q3 2025 results are not reported in today’s coverage; no revenue growth figure provided.
